products.name: Samsung Galaxy S10
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S10 is a high-end smartphone that features a 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, a triple-lens rear camera setup, and a 3,400mAh battery.

products.name: iPhone 11
products.description: The iPhone 11 is a smartphone designed, developed, and marketed by Apple Inc. It is the thirteenth generation lower-priced iPhone, succeeding the iPhone XR.

products.name: Google Pixel 4
products.description: The Google Pixel 4 is a smartphone that features a 5.7-inch OLED display, dual rear cameras, and a 2,800mAh battery.

products.name: Huawei P30 Pro
products.description: The Huawei P30 Pro is a flagship smartphone that features a 6.47-inch OLED display, quad rear cameras, and a 4,200mAh battery.

products.name: OnePlus 7T
products.description: The OnePlus 7T is a high-end smartphone that features a 6.55-inch Fluid AMOLED display, triple rear cameras, and a 3,800mAh battery.

products.name: Xiaomi Mi 9
products.description: The Xiaomi Mi 9 is a flagship smartphone that features a 6.39-inch Super AMOLED display, triple rear cameras, and a 3,300mAh battery.

products.name: LG G8 ThinQ
products.description: The LG G8 ThinQ is a high-end smartphone that features a 6.1-inch OLED display, dual rear cameras, and a 3,500mAh battery.

products.name: Sony Xperia 1
products.description: The Sony Xperia 1 is a flagship smartphone that features a 6.5-inch OLED display, triple rear cameras, and a 3,330mAh battery.

products.name: Motorola Moto G7
products.description: The Motorola Moto G7 is a mid-range smartphone that features a 6.2-inch IPS LCD display, dual rear cameras, and a 3,000mAh battery.

products.name: Nokia 9 PureView
products.description: The Nokia 9 PureView is a flagship smartphone that features a 5.99-inch P-OLED display, penta rear cameras, and a 3,320mAh battery.
